OBJECTIVE
- Try to learning as much as possible and doing my best in order to accompish mytask. 
- To have good opportunities to get promotion in my job.
-  Develop my skills with development of company,I want to prove myself.
- 2-3 years : Become a senior .NET deveploper.
- 4-6 years : Become a team leader.
WORK EXPERIENCE
.NET DEVELOPER :
FPT TELECOM HCM
NOV 2016 - APRIL 2018
 - Programming front end : Use Html , Css, Jquery , Boostrap, KendoUI
to design interface for tools management.
- Programming back end :C#, ASP.NET MVC, OOP.
- Database: SQL 2012, Oracle. Use ADO.NET, Stored Procedure, Web
API,Webservice to get data.
- Experienced in project development.
+ Understand basic and advanced business skills and then apply
programming knowledge to build tools skills.
+ Support other departments get data to serve for Company.
+ Experienced in web application using ASP.NET MVC.
UNIT CORP
.NET DEVELOPER :
MAY 2018 - PRESENT
 - Programming front end : Angularjs, bootstrap, html, css,
javascript,jquery,lodash.
- Programming back end :C#, Web API,Sharepoint(basic).
- Database: SQL 2012, Oracle.
- Experienced in project development.
+ Understand basic and advanced business skills and then apply
programming knowledge to build tools skills.
+ Experienced in singles pages web application on financial banking.
